name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Senior Go Engineer with 10+ years of experience in developing and delivering high-performance software solutions. Proficient in **Golang**, **Linux**, and **Kubernetes**, with extensive hands-on expertise in debugging and building containerized applications using **Containers**, **Kubevirt**, **KVM**, and **QEMU**. Demonstrated skill in collaborating on **upstream projects** and creating robust test plans to ensure the reliability of software products. Self-driven and flexible, I excel in fast-paced environments, prioritizing effective communication in **English**. Additionally, I possess a strong background in cloud-native application deployment on **Azure** and **AWS**, along with experience in enterprise systems architecture and compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. My commitment to building technically sound systems is complemented by practical experience in MLOps, deploying machine learning pipelines using tools like **MLflow** and **Airflow**, which drive real-world impact.
